Package pl.kmolski.hydrohomie.coaster.service

Interface CoasterService

All Known Implementing Classes:
CoasterServiceImpl
public interface CoasterService
Coaster state management service. Operations like inactivity time/initial load update, coaster state reset, creating and fetching measurements are handled here.

  • Method Details

    • getCoasterAndDailySumVolume

      reactor.core.publisher.Mono<reactor.util.function.Tuple2<Coaster,Float>> getCoasterAndDailySumVolume(String deviceName, Instant now)
      Fetch the coaster entity and the sum of volume measurements for the given date.
      Parameters:
      deviceName - the device ID
      now - the date to fetch the volume sum for
      Returns:
      Tuple2 containing the Coaster entity and volume sum

    • updateCoasterInactivity

      reactor.core.publisher.Mono<Coaster> updateCoasterInactivity(String deviceName, int inactiveSeconds, Instant now)
      Update the coaster inactivity time with the specified value.
      Parameters:
      deviceName - the device ID
      inactiveSeconds - the amount of seconds for which the coaster was inactive
      now - the current time
      Returns:
      the updated Coaster entity

    • updateCoasterInitLoad

      reactor.core.publisher.Mono<Coaster> updateCoasterInitLoad(String deviceName, float initLoad, Instant now)
      Update the coaster initial weight measurement with the specified value.
      Parameters:
      deviceName - the device ID
      initLoad - the initial weight measurement
      now - the current time
      Returns:
      the updated Coaster entity

    • createMeasurement

      reactor.core.publisher.Mono<Coaster> createMeasurement(String deviceName, Measurement measurement, Instant now)
      Create a Measurement for the specified Coaster.
      Parameters:
      deviceName - the device ID
      measurement - the measurement record
      now - the current time
      Returns:
      the entity

    • resetCoasterState

      reactor.core.publisher.Mono<Coaster> resetCoasterState(String deviceName, Instant now)
      Reset the coaster state in the database.
      Parameters:
      deviceName - the device ID
      now - the current time
      Returns:
      the reset Coaster entity

    • getMeasurementsByIntervalGrouped

      reactor.core.publisher.Flux<Measurement> getMeasurementsByIntervalGrouped(String deviceName, String username, Instant start, Instant end, ChronoUnit timeUnit, ZoneId timezone)
      Fetch the measurements for the specified coaster and time period at time zone, grouped by the given time unit.
      Parameters:
      deviceName - the device ID
      username - the coaster owner's username
      start - the period start time
      end - the period end time
      timeUnit - the time unit to group by
      timezone - the period time zone
      Returns:
      Flux of grouped Measurements for the coaster

    • getLatestMeasurements

      reactor.core.publisher.Flux<Measurement> getLatestMeasurements(String deviceName, String username)
      Fetch the 10 latest measurements for the coaster.
      Parameters:
      deviceName - the device ID
      username - the coaster owner's username
      Returns:
      Flux of the latest Measurements for the coaster
